column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba isn't a place to go to if you want nice ambience. It's loud
column2: the chairs aren't exactly very comfortable
column3: and expect a large crowd. But the FOOOOD. The food is pretty awesome. We ordered a bunch of things - the serrano ham
column6: the roast dates with bacon & apple vinaigrette
column12: and seared scallops. Everything was portioned out really well and the mix of flavors was just incredible. Our server was also very helpful and attentive
column13: which of course added to the experience.
